subject: SSN5454
description_text:
Can I get an update on the status of this order?

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi John McGee,    I have checked your order SSN5454. The US warehouse has received the items today and they should be shipped to you soon.  We apologize for any delay, as logistics can be slower during the peak season.
